name: Reincarnation:  Bring evil to life.
blurb: I'm looking for backers to help bring my character, the demon from Reincarnation, to life by turning him into a plush doll with a voice box.

rewards.reward: This backing gets your name in the credits of the next Reincarnation game after this project has been backed.  You can Request to have a link to your website (as long as it's nothing too crazy) on your name as well.

After receiving all of the above, these backers get the limited edition demon plush doll.  They will also receive a personal thank you note from me.  By pledging this much, you are getting the doll at $15 exactly.  I will cover shipping to anywhere.

NOTE:  This does not apply to any other rewards.  This is a flat rate Reward.  No extra shipping required.\r\n\r\nThese backers will receive the limited edition Reincarnation Demon shirt in their size.  Please be sure to request this backing when you make your pledge.  This backing does not come with a doll.

After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive an extra doll.  That means you will be getting TWO dolls much cheaper!  I'll also throw in some B-group Productions Decals.\r\nThis reward will not apply to any of the higher pledges.

After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive TWO extra dolls.  That means you will be getting THREE dolls much cheaper!  I'll also throw in some B-group Productions Decals.\r\nThis reward will not apply to any of the higher pledges.
After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive a bunch of B-group Decals and a poster from Reincarnation signed by me.  I'll personalize the signature if requested.
After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive a B-group Productions shirt in your size.

After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive a Reincarnation shirt in your size.  The shirt will be purple and have the face of the demon in the center of it.  (You still get the B-group Productions shirt with this as well - That means you get TWO shirts.)  They also get an original hand-drawn picture of the demon done by me.
After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive an extra doll that will be signed by me.

After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive the chance to pick something EVIL for the demon to say in the next game.  (it may not be inappropriate or vulgar)\r\nI will also draw you In the Reincarnation way next to the demon.

NOTE:  This does not apply to any other reward.  Also,  International backers should add on another $40 for shipping for this one.  US backers should add on another $10.

These backers receive a box of goodies including:
1.)  As many dolls as I can fit in an 11" x 8 1/2" x 5 1/2" box.  I won't know how many I can fit till I get the dolls, but I would image it would be about 4 or more dolls.
2.)  A multimedia framed cell from any scene in any Reincarnation game.  This is going to be a mix of a print and hand-painted cell.  The cell will be in a 5x7 frame.
3.)Reincarnation T-shirt.
4.)B-group Shirt
5.)B-group Decals
6.)You drawn as a character in the game.
After receiving all of the above, these backers will receive a cameo in the next game and a Demon Figurine.
